attributes.action: prevent the misuse of the word 'unlimited' by business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increasingly the word 'unlimited', implying by definition 'without limitation', is being used to describe the availability of services supplied by, for example, ISPs and phone companies for a service which plainly is anything but unlimited.

It is about time, regardless of any existence of an explanation of limitations within the terms & conditions, that the use of such blatantly inappropriate marketing to sell a product or service was prohibited and consigned to history.

A truly unlimited service would not stipulate the restrictions of usage capping. Force companies to advertise the services as they really are - with limits!
